sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161090 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CD_VVAL_KRN_CD , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #cdVvalKrnCd# , #famResnoEncCntn# , #scxpsStd# , #scxpsUseAmt# , #scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , #scxpsStdClDivCd# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE161090 SET ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
, SCXPS_STD = #scxpsStd#
, CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = #cdVvalKrnCd# , SCXPS_STD = #scxpsStd# , SCXPS_USE_AMT = #scxpsUseAmt# , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT = #scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD = #scxpsStdClDivCd#
WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = #cdVvalKrnCd# AND SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD = #scxpsStdClDivCd# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN = #famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YE161090 WHERE DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN =#famResnoEncCntn#
AND CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = #cdVvalKrnCd#
AND SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD = #scxpsStdClDivCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD , AA.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD AS cdVvalKrnCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD) AS cdVvalKrnCdcommCdNm , AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , AA.SCXPS_STD , AA.SCXPS_STD AS scxpsStdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SCXPS_STD) AS scxpsStdcommCdNm , AA.SCXPS_STD AS SCXPS_STD_TMP , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SCXPS_STD) AS SCXPS_STD_TMP_NM
, AA.SCXPS_USE_AMT , AA.SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , AA.SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD , AA.SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD AS scxpsStdClDivCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD) AS scxpsStdClDivCdcommCdNm
, AA.SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD AS SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD_TMP , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_CD) AS SCXPS_STD_CL_DIV_NM
, AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , ( CASE WHEN CC.RESN_REGN_NUM = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN THEN CC.HAN_NM ELSE BB.FAMY_NM END )AS FAMY_NM
FROM YE161090 AA, PSNL0115 BB , PSNL0100 CC
WHERE AA.DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey# AND AA.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD =#cdVvalKrnCd#
AND AA.DPOB_CD =BB.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY =BB.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN =BB.FAMY_RESN_REGN_NUM(+)
AND AA.DPOB_CD =CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY =CC.SYSTEMKEY
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(SYSTEMKEY) totcnt FROM YE161090 WHERE DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey# AND CD_VVAL_KRN_CD =#cdVvalKrnCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE161090 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161090 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #famResnoEncCntn# , #scxpsStd# , #scxpsUseAmt# , #scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE161090 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# , SCXPS_STD=#scxpsStd# , SCXPS_USE_AMT=#scxpsUseAmt# , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT=#scxpsStdDdcTrgtIndvAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE161090 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161090 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , SCXPS_STD , SCXPS_USE_AMT , SCXPS_STD_DDC_TRGT_INDV_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161090 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE161090 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
